name: Do not Press the Red Button
name_original: Do not Press the Red Button
description:
There are no losers and winners in this game, there are only buttons! :)

Almost all of us saw this unusual and fascinating app about the Red Button
Now you have unique chance to know the true story about the Red Button, right on your Mac.

There are doors shouldn't be opened, there are secrets shouldn't be told, there are buttons shouldn't be pressed…
But, if you really love red buttons, if you love to Groundhog Day – you are on the right way!

Features:
◉ Easy to use user interface :)
◉ Quite fun, and not so complicated story

Don't forget to show this app to your friends!
